remarks: Construct a proportional vector ` Y ` whose inner product with the original ` X ` equals one.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hdmapip1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmapip1.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapip1.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmapip1.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
hdmapip1.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
hdmapip1.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hdmapip1.i $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
hdmapip1.n $e |- N = ( invr ` R ) $.
hdmapip1.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapip1.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmapip1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
hdmapip1.y $e |- Y = ( ( N ` ( ( S ` X ) ` X ) ) .x. X ) $.
hdmapip1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` X ) ` Y ) = .1. ) $.
